DOC.brief_summary: This study assess feasibility effect early integrative supportive care program patient Advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma ( aPDAC ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Two-step cohort study : * Step 1 : A 14-day integrative supportive care program initiate early clinical suspicion aPDAC . According investigator 's assessment patient need , integrative supportive care program include : - management pain - nutritional support - pathologic diagnosis ( endoscopy guide percutaneous biopsy ascitis cytology ) - diagnostic compute image - endoscopic stenting bile duct and/or duodenum * Step 2 : Follow integrative supportive care program . According Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ( ECOG PS ) and/or chemotherapy - Group 1 : Patient become eligible treatment FOLFIRINOX nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine / clinical trial - Group 2 : Patient end 14-day program ( Step 1 ) remain either : - Persisting ECOG PS ≥ 2 b - Clinico-biological feature make ineligible receive FOLFIRINOX nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine regimens c - Patient ineligible therapeutic clinical trial
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria STEP 1 : 1 . No prior history cancer , except : situ breast , cervix cancer , basal cell carcinoma and/or complete remission 3 year another cancer . 5 .
